quotes: Against this background, Salim was elected secretary-general of the OAU on 27 July 1989 and took up office in September.
Against this background, Salim was elected secretary-general of the OAU on 27 July 1989 and took up office in September.
Shortly after Salim’s appointment came the fall of the Berlin Wall – an event that had been preceded by waves of popular revolt in Eastern Europe since 1986.
Then, two years later, on 26 December 1991, the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics ceased to exist.
As explained elsewhere in this volume, he had been appointed in 1970 as Tanzania’s Permanent Representative to the UN and was elected as president of the UN Security Council in January 1976.

quotes: While at the UN, Salim served as president of the 34th Session of the UN General Assembly, led the UN Security Council Committee on Sanctions Against Rhodesia
In his bid for the position, Salim was not merely a candidate of Tanzania, however, since he was proposed on behalf of the Southern African Development Community Chapter 4
As explained elsewhere in this volume, he had been appointed in 1970 as Tanzania’s Permanent Representative to the UN and was elected as president of the UN Security Council in January 1976.
The man who had led the campaign to draft Salim into the election was the president of Zimbabwe, Robert Mugabe, who had urged the president of Tanzania to agree to Salim’s candidature.
Shortly after Salim’s appointment came the fall of the Berlin Wall – an event that had been preceded by waves of popular revolt in Eastern Europe since 1986.
Now Africa was free from the proxy wars that had ravaged the continent, particularly in the Horn and in southern Africa, although its effects would linger for generations.
Now Africa was free from the proxy wars that had ravaged the continent, particularly in the Horn and in southern Africa, although its effects would linger for generations.

As explained elsewhere in this volume, he had been appointed in 1970 as Tanzania’s Permanent Representative to the UN and was elected as president of the UN Security Council in January 1976.

While at the UN, Salim served as president of the 34th Session of the UN General Assembly, led the UN Security Council Committee on Sanctions Against Rhodesia, served as president of the International Conference
assembled_events.notes: Multiple roles and organizations mentioned together, assuming simultaneous positions.

issues.description: Start date (1970) and end date (January 1976) are plausible but lack clarity on whether the UN Security Council presidency was held concurrently or sequentially with the Permanent Representative role.
Missing time markers for multiple roles and organizations, making it difficult to establish temporal coherence.
